Antonyms: 重 沉

輕易 [ qīng yì ]: easily; lightly; rashly

heisig_chinese_memo: This car has a digital spool display to let you know when you have a lightweight amount of gas (i.e. your gas is running low).
Ru_trainchinese:
qīng: (прил) легкий, нетяжелый; небольшой по количеству или интенсивности; неважный; слабый, мягкий
qīng: (графема) легкий, портативный; расслабленный; недооценивать, умалять; легкомысленный; неосмотрительный
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A lightweight alternative to driving your own car is car-spool-ing.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " car " and "巠", the original meaning of the object weight or weight is not large, as opposed to " heavy ", the original meaning is light car ("Shuowen"). The characters of Chu series from " Yu " and "巠" are also interpreted as " light ". "Shuowen": "The light car. From the car, the sound." "The Songs of Chu-Nine Debates": "The front is light and the awkward, the back is the follower." Zhu Xi's notes: "The light, the car It is light but has a window." "Mencius-King Liang Hui": "Power, then know the severity; degree, then know the length."

" Light " can also mean invaluable and low status. "Guanzi‧ Riding the Number of Horses": "If something is light, it will be vented, and if it is heavy, it will be shot." "Han Feizi‧Yu Lao": "Poorness means lightness, and absence of power means irritability."

" Light " also means shallow and small. Tang Dumu's "Zhu Po Quatrains" Part 2: "Sing Qiao'er in Yanshen Moss Lane, the flowers are cold, light and tired, and the guests return."

" Light " also means lightness. Yinqueshan Han Tomb Bamboo Slip "Sun Bin's Art of War: Ten Arrays": "There are counts in the service, and if you make it a genius, it will be light and profitable."

" Light " is also used as frivolous, as in "Thirty-three Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xi Gong": "Master Qin is light and rude, and he will lose." For example, "Han Feizi: Death Expedition": "The Lord has many complaints. It’s easy to use soldiers. It’s simple to teach and to lightly fight and attack, but you can die.” Used for ease, as in "Mencius-King Lianghui": "Then the good will be driven, and the people will follow it lightly." For example, "Zhuangzi‧ Qiushui": "I have heard about Shaozhongni, and I despise the righteous ones of Bo Yi."

In modern Chinese, young people are called "young", as in the fourth chapter of "A Dream of Red Mansions": "The little novice monk can not bear the bleakness of the temple, so he took advantage of his young age to grow his hair and act as a gate."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " car " and "巠", the original meaning of the object is not large in weight or weight, as opposed to " heavy ", the original meaning is light car ("Shu Wen").
humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「巠」聲，本義物體重量或分量不大，與「重」相對，一說本義為輕車（《說文》）。楚系文字從「羽」從「巠」的字亦釋為「輕」。《說文》：「輕車也。从車，巠聲。」《楚辭‧九辯》：「前輕輬之鏘鏘兮，後輜乘之從從。」 朱熹集注：「輕輬，車之輕而有窗者。」《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「權，然後知輕重；度，然後知長短。」

　　「輕」也可表示不貴重、地位低。《管子‧乘馬數》：「彼物輕則見泄，重則見射。」 《韓非子‧喻老》：「無勢之謂輕，離位之謂躁。」

　　「輕」還表示程度淺、數量少。唐杜牧〈朱坡絕句〉之二：「煙深苔巷唱樵兒，花落寒輕倦客歸。」

　　「輕」亦表示輕便。銀雀山漢墓竹簡《孫臏兵法‧十陣》：「從役有數，令之為屬枇，必輕必利。」

　　「輕」還用作輕佻，如《左傳‧僖公三十三年》：「秦師輕而無禮，必敗。」用作輕率，如 《韓非子‧亡徵》：「主多怨而好用兵，簡本教而輕戰攻者，可亡也。」用作輕易，如《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「然後驅而之善，故民之從之也輕。」用作輕視，如《莊子‧秋水》：「我嘗聞少仲尼之聞，而輕伯夷之義者。」

　　近現代漢語中，年歲小稱作「年輕」，如《紅樓夢》第4回：「﹝小沙彌﹞耐不得寺院淒涼，遂趁年紀輕，蓄了髮，充當門子。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」，「巠」聲，本義物體重量或分量不大，與「重」相對，一說本義為輕車（《說文》）。

輕輕RS
轻轻 		light, easy, simple, gentle
  • car 車 going as easy as a stream 巠/𢀖: lightly loaded and easy to push
(Simplified: 轻)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 重 沉
Pictophonetic: 巠 indicates the sound; 車 (cart) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 巠 [ jīng ] underground river; flowing water
①分量小，與“重(zhòng)”相對：輕重。輕型。輕便(biàn)。輕於鴻毛。輕塵棲弱草(喻人生渺小短暫)。
②程度淺，數量少：年輕。工作輕。
③用力小：輕放。輕聲。輕閒。輕描淡寫。
④負載少，裝備簡省：輕裝。輕騎。輕銳(輕裝的精銳部隊)。
⑤認爲容易，不以爲重要：輕視。輕蔑。輕生。
⑥隨便，不莊重：輕率(shuài)。輕佻。輕浮。
⑦沉重。
輕鬆 [ qīng sōng ]: light; gentle; relaxed; effortless; uncomplicated; to relax; to take things less seriously
輕易 [ qīng yì ]: easily; lightly; rashly

從「 車 」，「 巠 」聲，本義物體重量或分量不大，與「 重 」相對，一說本義為輕車（《說文》）。楚系文字從「 羽 」從「 巠 」的字亦釋為「 輕 」。《說文》：「輕車也。从車，巠聲。」《楚辭‧九辯》：「前輕輬之鏘鏘兮，後輜乘之從從。」 朱熹集注：「輕輬，車之輕而有窗者。」《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「權，然後知輕重；度，然後知長短。」 「 輕 」也可表示不貴重、地位低。《管子‧乘馬數》：「彼物輕則見泄，重則見射。」 《韓非子‧喻老》：「無勢之謂輕，離位之謂躁。」 「 輕 」還表示程度淺、數量少。唐杜牧〈朱坡絕句〉之二：「煙深苔巷唱樵兒，花落寒輕倦客歸。」 「 輕 」亦表示輕便。銀雀山漢墓竹簡《孫臏兵法‧十陣》：「從役有數，令之為屬枇，必輕必利。」 「 輕 」還用作輕佻，如《左傳‧僖公三十三年》：「秦師輕而無禮，必敗。」用作輕率，如 《韓非子‧亡徵》：「主多怨而好用兵，簡本教而輕戰攻者，可亡也。」用作輕易，如《孟子‧梁惠王上》：「然後驅而之善，故民之從之也輕。」用作輕視，如《莊子‧秋水》：「我嘗聞少仲尼之聞，而輕伯夷之義者。」 近現代漢語中，年歲小稱作「年輕」，如《紅樓夢》第4回：「﹝小沙彌﹞耐不得寺院淒涼，遂趁年紀輕，蓄了髮，充當門子。」
From the sound of " car" and " 巠", the original meaning of the object weight or weight is not large, as opposed to " heavy", the original meaning is light car ("Shuowen"). The characters of Chu series from " Yu" and " 巠" are also interpreted as " light". "Shuowen": "The light car. From the car, the sound." "The Songs of Chu-Nine Debates": "The front is light and the awkward, the back is the follower." Zhu Xi's notes: "The light, the car It is light but has a window." "Mencius-King Liang Hui": "Power, then know the severity; degree, then know the length." " Light" can also mean invaluable and low status. "Guanzi‧ Riding the Number of Horses": "If something is light, it will be vented, and if it is heavy, it will be shot." "Han Feizi‧Yu Lao": "Poorness means lightness, and absence of power means irritability." " Light" also means shallow and small. Tang Dumu's "Zhu Po Quatrains" Part 2: "Sing Qiao'er in Yanshen Moss Lane, the flowers are cold, light and tired, and the guests return." " Light" also means lightness. Yinqueshan Han Tomb Bamboo Slip "Sun Bin's Art of War: Ten Arrays": "There are counts in the service, and if you make it a genius, it will be light and profitable." " Light" is also used as frivolous, as in "Thirty-three Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xi Gong": "Master Qin is light and rude, and he will lose." For example, "Han Feizi: Death Expedition": "The Lord has many complaints. It’s easy to use soldiers. It’s simple to teach and to lightly fight and attack, but you can die.” Used for ease, as in "Mencius-King Lianghui": "Then the good will be driven, and the people will follow it lightly." For example, "Zhuangzi‧ Qiushui": "I have heard about Shaozhongni, and I despise the righteous ones of Bo Yi." In modern Chinese, young people are called "young", as in the fourth chapter of "A Dream of Red Mansions": "The little novice monk can not bear the bleakness of the temple, so he took advantage of his young age to grow his hair and act as a gate."

輕字的基本解释

輕
qīng
见“轻”。

輕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qīng］
［《廣韻》去盈切，平清，溪。］
“轻1”的繁体字。亦作“軽1”。
(1)物体的重量小。与“重”相对。
(2)贱；不贵重。
(3)地位低。
(4)短浅。
(5)程度浅；数量少。
(6)灵巧；轻便。
(7)轻佻。
(8)轻率；不慎重。
(9)轻易；容易。
(10)宽大；宽容。
(11)轻视；鄙视。
(12)减少；削弱。
(13)指轻钱。
(14)指轻细之物。
(15)松散。
(16)着力不多；不费力。
(17)形容颜色浅淡。
(18)年岁小。
(19)书法用语。
(20)“氫”的旧写。

輕字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輕； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1244第09
〔古文〕??【廣韻】去盈切【集韻】【韻會】牽盈切【正韻】丘京切，?音卿。【說文】輕車也。【廣韻】重之對也。　又去聲。【廣韻】虛正切【集韻】【韻會】牽正切【正韻】丘正切，?音慶。【集韻】疾也。【左傳·桓十二年】絞小而輕，輕則寡謀。又【僖三十三年】秦師輕而無禮。

輕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輕字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qīng］
["Guangyun" goes to Yingqie, Pingqing, Xi. ]
Traditional characters for "轻1". Also known as "軽1".
(1) The weight of the object is small. Contrast with "heavy".
(2) Cheap; not expensive.
(3) Low status.
(4) Short and shallow.
(5) The degree is shallow; the quantity is small.
(6) Dexterity; lightness.
(7) Frivolous.
(8) Reckless; careless.
(9) Easy; easy.
(10) Leniency; tolerance.
(11) Contempt; contempt.
(12) Reduce; weaken.
(13) Refers to light money.
(14) Refers to something light and delicate.
(15) Loose.
(16) Not much effort; effortless.
(17) Describe the lightness of the color.
(18) Young.
(19) Calligraphy terms.
(20) Old writing of "hydrogen".
light

[Guangyun] virtual tangent [Jiyun] [yunhui] pull tangent [Zhengyun] Qiu tangent,? Yinqing. 【Jiyun】Illness. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Twelve Years] Twisting is small and light, but light is inconsiderate. Also 【Thirty-three Years of Xi】Qin Shi was light and rude.
